name: Quantify Biofilm Biomass Crystal Violet
description: Quantify biofilm biomass using the crystal violet staining method
run: git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/snap-stanford/Biomni /tmp/biomni && pip install -q -e /tmp/biomni && python /mnt/code/quantify_biofilm_biomass_crystal_violet.py

fields.name: absorbance_readings
fields.description: List of absorbance readings at 590nm for each well

fields.name: control_wells
fields.description: List of absorbance readings for control wells (no bacteria)

fields.name: sample_names
fields.description: List of sample names corresponding to absorbance readings
